amendment.description: To improve and provide for the review of intelligence estimate and products.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3815 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3815 proposed by Senator Rockefeller. (consideration: CR S10038-10040; text: CR S10039) To improve and provide for the review of intelligence estimate and products.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3815 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3815 proposed by Senator Rockefeller.
